Each mask is made with triple layer construction that is easy to wash and a built-in lanyard so you never lose a mask again!
body.description: Are you always searching for your face mask? Well, now you don't have to! Presenting Copper Fit Guardwell NEVER LOST face masks - breathable, reuseable, washable and adjustable. Suitable for all ages and recommended to wash before use. Each package comes with 2 face masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable masks ever
reviews.reviewText: Love very much. Very comfortable and adjustable! Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perhaps a little small for some people but not too small for me.
reviews.reviewText: I think I have an average sized head compared to other family members so the mask fits just fine size wise; but I did find that the part that goes over your nose does tend to slip down more than other masks I have and this could be do to there being less material. I fixed this by putting the bottom part of the mask on the edge of my chin rather than under my chin and with a bit of stubble that works for me; however with a clean shaven face not sure if the part I put on my chin wouldn't also slip down there by allowing the nose part to slip down again. Overall I think this is a nice option if you need a mask to put on and take off on a regular basis having it always handy; although the other option is to buy some face mask lanyards to use with any mask. The one thing I can add to buying this item over using a lanyard along with another mask is that this does not tend to pull on your ears (or at least is more adjustable) compared to face masks with stretchy ear loops. My final verdict is you really have to try it but if you tend to have a large head when wearing hats for example this probably isn't going to fit size wise unless they come out with a larger version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this during Christmas , I was traveling and I needed a new one the only issue was I was too tight behind my ear. It was soft , breathable and nice look. I think my colors was black and gray.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small but still useful
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these masks with the intention of reducing the amount of dust I inhale while cleaning at the end of the day. The built-in lanyard is a convenient feature, but there's room for improvement in the mask's size. When I speak, the mask tends to ride up off my chin, and sometimes the nose part slips down, leaving gaps at the top of the mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too SMALL and misshaped!
reviews.reviewText: One size does NOT fit all! A seven year old might be able to wear the masks we received, but not an average adult! We are not large people, but they were too small for all of us. Also, upon closer inspection we found that one side of the masks had been cut 1/2" narrower and 1/4" shorter than the other side of the mask. This resulted in the mask pulling to one side and not covering our faces as we moved or talked. It kept moving up covering nose and lips but not the chin. Pulling it down over the chin resulted in it slipping down off the nose a few minutes later. The center seam was also off from the top peak. The fabric was very thin allowing for light to filter through. They did label the box as "not for covid use" so guess that was to be expected. We were so disappointed with this product that we returned the unopened box and will probably toss the ones we tried on. This is the worst product we have ever gotten from Amazon! Total waste of money in this covid time! Would not even give it a 1 star if that option was available. Also, no more Copper Fit products for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No more looking for my mask...it there! I love both the look and feel of this mask...very comfortable. It being adjustable sets it apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars beware of sizing
reviews.reviewText: If these masks are sold as one-size-fits-all then the "all" is a very narrow group including petite adults and children.Conceptually I like the earloop and lanyard mechanism however I am not able to make good use of the Mask because it does not fit under my chin and over my nose at the same time. I am a six foot seven man so I am used to things fitting a little small when they have a generic sizing but these masks also did not fit on my wife who is 5,' 7".Please be aware that sizing of masks is important to be effective. I would not recommend these masks for most adults. It would be nice if there was a larger size option. I may even take the two masks provided and reconstruct them into a single larger mask because I like the mechanism with the loop and lanyard.
If you gotta wear a mask this one is a good one. Nice fit and being able to remove it and still have it hang around your neck is super convenient.
Excelente producto, fresco y cómodo, compré un paquete de prueba y al ver que funcionaba bien compré otros 2

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 28, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have 4 of these which I alternate the main feature that works for me I am 74 hrs old is the fact that you can pop it on and off because it hangs around your neck. I know I can’t forget it after getting out of car it’s right there within reach hanging around my neck in front of me. So instead of getting to store door realizing I’ve left mask in car not with this one plus very easy to breath with the copper absorbing most of the heat inside mask.
Sorry we didn't order these ones sooner. Glad we have now anyways.
Al ponerse el cubrebocas y ajustarlo, los cordones en especial el izquierdo no ajusta lo suficiente y por lo tanto se pierde la forma pues se mueve y afloja y se ve y queda chueco el cubrebocas.
